TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BluetoothAdapter extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class BluetoothAdapter Inherits Object
public ref class BluetoothAdapter sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: Represents the local device Bluetooth adapter.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Intent used to broadcast the change in connection state of the local Bluetooth adapter to a profile of the remote device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has finished the device discovery process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has started the remote device discovery process.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The local Bluetooth adapter has changed its friendly Bluetooth name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Show a system activity that requests discoverable mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Activity Action: Show a system activity that allows the user to turn on Bluetooth.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: Indicates the Bluetooth scan mode of the local Adapter has changed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Broadcast Action: The state of the local Bluetooth adapter has been changed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary:
Extra used by #ACTION_CONNECTION_STATE_CHANGED
This extra represents the current connection state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Used as an optional int extra field in #ACTION_REQUEST_DISCOVERABLE intents to request a specific duration for discoverability in seconds.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Used as a String extra field in #ACTION_LOCAL_NAME_CHANGED intents to request the local Bluetooth name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary:
Extra used by #ACTION_CONNECTION_STATE_CHANGED
This extra represents the previous connection state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Used as an int extra field in #ACTION_SCAN_MODE_CHANGED intents to request the previous scan mode.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Used as an int extra field in #ACTION_STATE_CHANGED intents to request the previous power state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Used as an int extra field in #ACTION_SCAN_MODE_CHANGED intents to request the current scan mode.

Docs.summary: Used as an int extra field in #ACTION_STATE_CHANGED intents to request the current power state.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool GetProfileProxy (Android.Content.Context? context, Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfileServiceListener? listener, Android.Bluetooth.ProfileType profile);

.method public hidebysig instance bool GetProfileProxy(class Android.Content.Context context, class Android.Bluetooth.IBluetoothProfileServiceListener listener, valuetype Android.Bluetooth.ProfileType profile) cil managed
Public Function GetProfileProxy (context As Context, listener As IBluetoothProfileServiceListener, profile As ProfileType) As Boolean
public: bool GetProfileProxy(Android::Content::Context ^ context, Android::Bluetooth::IBluetoothProfileServiceListener ^ listener, Android::Bluetooth::ProfileType profile);

Docs.param: The service Listener for connection callbacks.
The Bluetooth profile; either BluetoothProfile#HEADSET, BluetoothProfile#A2DP, BluetoothProfile#GATT, BluetoothProfile#HEARING_AID or BluetoothProfile#GATT_SERVER.
Docs.summary: Get the profile proxy object associated with the profile.
Docs.returns: true on success, false on error
